section.title: Monitoring Service
section.p: The Monitoring Service is the central component. It is responsible for receiving, persisting, and processing metrics and log data, as well as providing the data to the users.

The Monitoring Service relies on Monasca, an open-source Monitoring as a Service solution. It uses Monasca for high-speed metrics querying and integrates the streaming alarm engine and the notification engine of Monasca.

section.title: Horizon Plugin
section.p: comes with a plugin for the OpenStack Horizon dashboard. The plugin extends the main dashboard in OpenStack with a view for monitoring. This enables users to access the monitoring functions from a central Web-based graphical user interface.
Monitoring data is visualized on a convenient and easy-to-use dashboard which fully integrates with Grafana, an open-source application for visualizing large-scale measurement data.
